properties.name: operation

properties.description: The room related to the event

properties.name: mediaType
properties.description: General file

properties.name: Image
properties.description: Image media type

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: Name of the file being uploaded

properties.name: text
properties.description: The text to send

properties.name: messageFormat

properties.name: HTML
properties.description: HTML-formatted text

properties.description: A plain text message to display in case the HTML cannot be rendered by the Matrix client

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: otherOptions
properties.description: A JSON RoomEventFilter to filter returned events with. More information can be found on this page.

properties.name: Get Many
properties.description: Get many messages from a room

properties.name: Public Chat
properties.description: Open and public chat

properties.name: roomAlias
properties.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

properties.name: userId
properties.description: The fully qualified user ID of the invitee

properties.name: reason
properties.description: Reason for kick

properties.name: Invite
properties.description: Invite a user to a room

properties.name: Join
properties.description: Join a new room

properties.name: Kick
properties.description: Kick a user from a room

properties.name: Leave
properties.description: Leave a room

properties.name: filters
properties.description: Filtering options

properties.name: Ban
properties.description: Users removed from the room

properties.name: membership
properties.description: Only fetch users with selected membership status (uses OR filter with exclude membership)
